decision_conditions: Construction Phase Plan (Rev. 00) prepared by SBS Demolition (dated 29/07/2024), Site Waste Management Plan (Rev. 00) prepared by SBS Demolition (dated 31/07/2024), Traffic Management Plan (Rev. 00) prepared by SBS Demolition (dated 31/07/2024), Emergency Response Plan prepared by SBS Demolition (dated 31/07/2024), Risk Assessment & Method Statement prepared by SBS Demolition (dated 31/07/2024), Section 61 Consent Notice (dated 16/08/2024)
description: Approval of details pursuant to condition 4 (demolition and construction management plan) of planning permission reference: P2024/0325/FUL dated 26/07/2024 for demolition of the redundant three-storey caretakers house (plus associated garage) to create a sensory garden; hard/soft landscaping across the site; replacement of front entrance gate and all associated works
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
